Text: I was scared stiff of giving my first performance .

Just get over here !
Come in ! Quickly !

Security , Dan , security ! You can never be too safe you know ! A lot of sickos out there . Just the other day they caught that peeping tom red handed ! Had a high power telescope and binoculars by his window .

Paranoid ? I ’ m not paranoid ! I ’ m cautious ! You see Dan , we have to be on guard at all time ! People just invade your privacy as if they knew you ! Telemarketers , solicitors , even your bank ! They have way too much information ! I like to keep everything on a need to know basis .
You are being watched ! Be careful Dan ! Be careful !
I'm dead serious about this , Sally .
Oh , God . It ’ s late . I ’ m afraid I have to leave .

I guess I'm adventuresome , but then I'm scared too .
I'm scared that she might not come back .
But she took her luggage away with her .

I use those sites . Hey ! Let's go check out a flea market later .

I didn't do anything . Finally , he left.But then I saw him again today . Outside the shoe store . Near the cafe . I went into a CD store and pretended I was looking at CD's . But then he came in too .
He followed me all the way home !

I really want to have the job . Right now , I am still a little on the edge . I am not sure if I could convince them during the interview .

Thank you very much .
i think i'll be a little afraid .
afraid of making a mistake .
But I get scared the moment I see a needle . How could I stand having needles in my body for hours on end ?

Oh , wow , my palms are sweaty just thinking about it . I just hope Ms . Mendoza won't be able to hear my teeth chattering . I just hope I get through this in one piece .
